definitions.text: far beyond what is usual in magnitude or degree
examples: olympian efforts to save the city from bankruptcy

definitions.text: surpassing what is common or usual or expected
examples: he paid especial attention to her
a matter of particular and unusual importance
a special reason to confide in her
what's so special about the year 2000?

definitions.text: deviating widely from a norm of physical or mental ability; used especially of children below normal in intelligence
examples: special educational provisions for exceptional children
